job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: As an SRE youll be focused on running better production applications and systemsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliDesign code test and deliver software to automate manual operational workliliTroubleshoot priority incidents facilitate blameless postmortems and ensure permanent closure of incidentsliliEngage with development team throughout the life cycle to help develop software for reliability and scale ensuring minimal refactoring or changesliliIdentify application patterns and analytics in support of better service level objectivesliliDesign selfhealing and resiliency patternsliliDesign automated software and product upgrades change management and release management solutionsliliCoach or manage teams as applicableliliParticipate in the 24x7 support coverage as neededbrliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulliBachelors degree or equivalent experience in an software engineering disciplineliliExpertise in at least one technology stack designing coding testing and delivering softwareliliProficiency in one or more technology domains may be a crossdomain expert able to solve complex and mission critical problems within a business or across the firmliliWorking knowledge of infrastructure components eg routers load balancers cloud products container systems compute storage and networksliliExcellent debugging and trouble shooting
